channel.title: Redemption-X | Dungeoneering | 100% Uptime | & ALOT MORE!
channel.description:
http://www.redemption-x.net/play-now/
Redemption-X (Red-X) has amazing features such as dungeoneering on the server, A list off only a few off the features will be listed below:
- Dungeoneering - Fully Customized website (.net domain) - Fully working Slayer - Loyalty Points - Pest Control - New shops area in Falador Park - Working Summoning - Barrows - Fight Caves
Also why not pop into the server and train your character to fight some off the bosses? In Redemption-X we have Nex; King Black Dragon; Tormented Demons; Corporal Beast; Kalphite Queen; GodWars & BarrelChest along with more!
This server is a nice 317 server where you will never be bored, There is nice and friendly staff members and the owner is trying to put even more into the amazing server that he has already made. Here at Redemption-X we also have Squeal Off Fortune where you can get a nice little reward per day as you visit our Server!
We are also looking for hard and working staff members once we reach 15 players so why not join us and give us a try? We need hard and working staff to help run the server, The staff list will be listed below and updated when somebody else receives a staff spot or gets demoted from staff.
[b]Owner:[/b] D3mon
[b]Administrators:[/b] Closed Closed
[b]Moderators:[/b] Logan [u]Open[/u] Closed Closed Closed
[b]Need help?[/b]
My in-game name is: Links - Be sure to add me and send me a message if your in need off help or have a problem, or if you just would like to chat just say hi (:
[u][b]Donations[/b][/u]
[spoil]What does Donating to Redemption-X get me? 1. Access to Donator zone (::dz) 2. The items you donate for.
[b]Where does my Donation go to?[/b]
Donations that are recieved will go towards the server.. This could be for the vps payment.. the website payment.. or buying systems.
Donator status $10
Super Donator status $20
Extreme Donator Status $30
[b][u]Donate4Items[/u][/b]
[u]If you donate over $15 the status is free.[/u]
Partyhats $15 each
Santa Hat $15
H'Ween Mask $15 each
Dragon Claws $10
Armadyl Godsword $10 All others $7
Vesta Set (with weapon) $10
Statius set (with weapon) $10
Dharoks set $8
All other barrows sets $5 each.
Primal Weapons $8 each
Chaotic Weapons $8 each[/spoil]

item.title: Redemption-X | Dungeoneering | 100% Uptime | & ALOT MORE!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

fix your bbc, I also don’t suggest saying “owner is trying to put even more into the amazing server that he has already made.” considering at least one person is going to make a snide comment about "did you really do this/that? "

Read full topic
